attributes.additional_details: To think about the cost of living . Fuel prices . And those of whom are having to pay £25. Room and more . This is unfair on those who have lived in these homes for years . By forcing them into Alot smaller property's normal high rise. Being told your not allowed your family to stay. Bedroom Tax is for the poor haven't we suffered enough
attributes.background: Cancel the bedroom tax. Discrimination against those on benefits. Taken their rights to live in the homes they have done for years. Making people choice or forced from their homes. Having to use money from the either their ESA. ICB or disability. Discrimination against our rights

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Stop the bedroom tax

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614575
